recipe.title: Zucchini Ribbons with Tarragon
ingredients: 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
instructions: Cut zucchini lengthwise into 1/8-inch-thick slices with slicer. Heat 1 Tbsp oil in a 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat until hot, then sauté half of zucchini with 1/4 tsp each of salt and pepper, stirring and turning frequently with tongs, until just tender, about 3 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and repeat with remaining oil and zucchini. Return first batch of zucchini to skillet. Add tarragon, lemon juice, and salt to taste and toss to combine.
Cut zucchini lengthwise into 1/8-inch-thick slices with slicer.

Heat 1 Tbsp oil in a 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat until hot, then sauté half of zucchini with 1/4 tsp each of salt and pepper, stirring and turning frequently with tongs, until just tender, about 3 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and repeat with remaining oil and zucchini.
Return first batch of zucchini to skillet. Add tarragon, lemon juice, and salt to taste and toss to combine.
